channel.title: go on Mr. Popov
channel.description: Recent content in go on Mr. Popov

item.title: About
item.description: Im web engineer with passion in scalable and high-loaded systems. Currently I have title of Technical Team Lead. In the past I used to work as research agent, freelancing and I've started few startups. I used to work on quite a few web projects with primary focus on backend, architecture and data storages. I dont have prefered technology, In my opinion you have to choose language or specific technology based on your problem.
